dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
D. Povey
S. Khudanpur
dcterms:description: An audiobook corpus derived from Librivox projects, including 1000 hours of audio data where speakers read English text. The dataset is divided into three subsets (100hr, 360hr, 500hr), with the 500hr subset being utilized in the experiments.
dcterms:title: Librispeech

dcterms:creator: A. Nagrani
J. S. Chung
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A large-scale speaker identification dataset used to train speaker recognition systems, providing a diverse set of speaker samples.
dcterms:title: VoxCeleb1

dcterms:creator: J. S. Chung
A. Nagrani
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: An extension of the VoxCeleb dataset, providing additional data for deep speaker recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: VoxCeleb2
